description: This table contains information regarding patient outreach topics, patients for which outreach was performed on these topics, who performed the outreach and when the outreach was done. The records included in this table are LFT records that are designated as clincal outreach tracking records.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this record or line. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_DTTM
columns.description: This column displays the instant of patient outreach.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_TOPIC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column displays patient outreach topics such as Diabetes or Hypertension.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


General


Diabetes mellitus


Hypertension


Asthma


Congestive heart failure


Chronic kidney disease


Obesity


Preventive Screening


Immunizations


Coronary artery disease


Chronic liver disease


Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease


Cystic fibrosis


HIV/AIDS


Osteoporosis


Cervical Cancer Screening


Breast Cancer Screening


Colorectal Cancer Screening


Tobacco Cessation Counseling


Tetanus, diphtheria, pertussis


Human papillomavirus


Meningococcal


Influenza


Pneumococcal


Hepatitis A


Hepatitis B


Inactivated poliovirus


Measles, mumps, rubella


Varicella


Rotavirus


Diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis


Haemophilus influenzae type b


Medication Transition


Fall Risk


Depression


Chronic Opioid Management


ADHD


Schizophrenia


Substance Use Disorder


PTSD


Lung Cancer Screening


All Topics


Non-Clinical Communication

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_USER_ID
columns.description: This column displays the user who performed the patient outreach action. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_NEXT_DT
columns.description: This column displays the date when the patient will next require outreach.

columns.name: LINKED_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item contains a pointer to the encounter linked with this outreach.

columns.name: PAT_OUT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the source of the patient outreach


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Health Maintenance

columns.name: MAIL_LETTER_NUM
columns.description: This contains the line in SI EPT 20200 which contains the details of the letter.

columns.name: PHONE_MSG_ID
columns.description: This item stores the pointer to the In Basket message that is sent out to support staff asking them to call patients.

columns.name: PAT_PORTAL_MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: This item stores a pointer to the MyChart message.
